Remaining Raw, Unidentified Changes for v3.2.1
These are the raw changes from NTSC 1.02 to SD Remix 3.2.1.
The eventual goal is for this section to be emptied as these changes are identified and moved to other files for SD Remix.
This is only for DOL changes. Full SD Remix requires other files to be changed.
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -

6C656420 70726F67 72616D20 65786365 7074696F 6E000000 496C6C65 67616C20 696E7374 72756374 696F6E00 50726976
696C6567 65642069 6E737472 75637469 6F6E0000 54726170 2070726F 6772616D 20657863 65707469 6F6E0000 556E6B6E
6F776E20 74797065 206F6620 70726F67 72616D20 65786365 7074696F 6E000000 25732025 73202530 38582028 72656164
2066726F 6D205352 5230290A 00000000 28464C4F 4154494E 4720504F 494E5429 0A000000 28444543 52454D45 4E544552
290A0000 28535953 54454D20 43414C4C 290A0000 28545241 4345290A 00000000 28504552 464F524D 414E4345 204D4F4E
49544F52 290A0000 28425245 414B504F 494E5429 0A000000 28535953 54454D20 494E5445 52525055 54290A00 28544845
524D414C 20494E54 45525250 5554290A 00000000 28554E4B 4E4F574E 290A0000 80394B94 80394BA4 80394BB4 80394C38
80394CA0 80394CB0 80394CD4 80394D54 80394D64 80394D74 80394D84 80394D94 80394DA4 80394DB4 80394DC4 3C3C2050
->  # 0x8040B6C0
81DF0010 2C0E012F 41820010 2C0E0130
41820008 4082000C 388000FB 48000008 38800026 4BC85108 00000000 00000000 39E00001 3E008046 6210B0FC 1E2F000C
7E31802E 5630014B 4182000C 3A200001 48000020 56300109 4182000C 3A200002 48000010 563002D7 418200DC 3A200003
3EA0803F 62B506D0 3EC0804D 62D66CAE 3A800000 3A600000 3A400000 2C110001 40820014 8A560000 2C12001C 418100A8
48000050 2C110003 40820010 3A80003F 3A600002 4800003C 1E12001C 7E10AA14 8AF0000A 3E008045 6210C388 82100000
7E10BC30 561007FF 41820010 3A600002 3A80003F 4800000C 3A600000 3A800000 1E12001C 7E10A82E 2C120016 41800008
82100010 82100018 82100004 82100008 8210001C 82100008 9A900024 1E12001C 3A100008 7E70A9AE 3A00001E 9A160000
2C110001 41820010 3A520001 2C12001D 41A0FF4C 39EF0001 2C0F0005 41A0FEE8 C022C9E8 4BE4EBAC 00000000 00000000
981B0000 38800DE4 3C84803F 38C00E74 3CC6803F 38840024 8A640000 2D130003 41AA0034 7D062000 40AAFFEC 3C80801C
6084B000 3E606000 92640BD4 92640F54 92640F84 3E604800 3A730028 92640EFC 4800003C 3C80801C 6084B000 3E604800
3A730115 92640BD4 3E604182 3A730028 92640EFC 3E604800 3A730BC5 92640F54 3E604BFF 6273D775 92640F84 4BE530E4
# 4088b0


	-==-


SDR Remix Debug Menu Entries
This replaces the entries in the debug menu with SD Remix specific items.
0x3F74E0 is the actual overwrite of debug menu items
We also have standalone functions for any debug specific functions.
We also have static overwrites for dwords that are our debug variables. This is here to firstly indicate default values but also as a way to track which ones we're using and  to put comments about what they're used for.
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
<varTogglesState>       # TODO that all references are resolved: 803fa350
0000 0000   # 0 for all disabled, 1 for allowed, 2 for Melee+ Preset

<strSdRemixOptions> ALL         # "< SD REMIX OPTIONS >"
3C 20 53 44 20 52 45 4D 49 58 20 4F 50 54 49 4F 4E 53 20 3E 00 00 00 00

<strGeneralOptionsSub> ALL      # "General Options >"
47 65 6E 65 72 61 6C 20 4F 70 74 69 6F 6E 73 20 3E 00 00 00

<strTogglesLabel> ALL           # "Toggles:"
54 6F 67 67 6C 65 73 3A 00 00 00 00

<strMeleePlusTogglesSub> ALL    # "Melee+ Toggles >"
4D 65 6C 65 65 2B 20 54 6F 67 67 6C 65 73 20 3E 00 00 00 00

<strOtherTogglesSub> ALL        # "Other Toggles >"
4F 74 68 65 72 20 54 6F 67 67 6C 65 73 20 3E 00

<strCreditsSub> ALL             # "Credits >"
43 72 65 64 69 74 73 20 3E 00 00 00

<strDebugMenuSub> ALL           # "Debug Menu >"
44 65 62 75 67 20 4D 65 6E 75 20 3E 00 00 00 00

<strMeleePlusEnabledOnly> ALL   # "Melee+ Enabled Only"
4D 65 6C 65 65 2B 20 45 6E 61 62 6C 65 64 20 4F 6E 6C 79 00

<arrEnableDisabledMelee>
803FA3F8    # TODO
803FA3F0    # TODO
.long <<strMeleePlusEnabledOnly>>

<funDbgChangeTogglesState> NTSC 1.02
  mflr r0
  stw r0,0x4(sp)
  stwu sp,-0x8(sp)
  addi sp, sp, -0xC
  stw r29, 0(sp)
  stw r30, 4(sp)
  stw r31, 8(sp)
  # The master toggle var is in r10
  lis r3, <<varTogglesState>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<varTogglesState>>@l
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 1
  beq ENABLED
  bgt MELEE_PLUS

  DISABLED:
  # Change the color of the banner
  lis r3, 0x8040
  ori r3, r3, 0xAAD4  # 8040AAD4 The banner color variable
  # First value
  li r4, 0xC
  stb r4, 3(r3)
  # second value
  li r4, 0xD
  stb r4, 0xB(r3)
  # Third value
  li r4, 0xE
  stb r4, 0x13(r3)
  # Disable the menu options
  lis r4, 0x803F
  ori r4, r4, 0xA4E0                          # 803FA4E0, The Main Debug Menu entry table start address
  li r3, 0
  stw r3, 0x60(r4)                            # Set 4th item (Melee+ Toggles), to 0, or disabled
  stw r3, 0x80(r4)                            # Set 5th item (Other toggles), to 0, or disabled
  lis r3, <<strMeleePlusTogglesSub>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<strMeleePlusTogglesSub>>@l    # Ptr to str "Melee+ Toggles >"
  stw r3, 0x68(r4)                            # Set the label of 4th item to this string
  b RETURN

  ENABLED:
  # Change the color of the banner
  lis r3, 0x8040
  ori r3, r3, 0xAAD4                          # 8040AAD4 The banner color variable
  # First value
  li r4, 0xD
  stb r4, 3(r3)
  # second value
  li r4, 0xD
  stb r4, 0xB(r3)
  # Third value
  li r4, 0xC
  stb r4, 0x13(r3)
  # Enable the menu options
  lis r4, 0x803F
  ori r4, r4, 0xA4E0                          # 803FA4E0, The Main Debug Menu entry table start address
  li r3, 1
  stw r3, 0x60(r4)                            # Set 4th item (Melee+ Toggles), to 1, or enabled
  stw r3, 0x80(r4)                            # Set 5th item (Other toggles), to 1, or enabled
  lis r3, <<strMeleePlusTogglesSub>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<strMeleePlusTogglesSub>>@l    # Ptr to str "Melee+ Toggles >"
  stw r3, 0x68(r4)                            # Set the label of 4th item to this string
  b RETURN

  MELEE_PLUS:
  # Change the color of the banner
  lis r3, 0x8040
  ori r3, r3, 0xAAD4  # 8040AAD4 The banner color variable
  # First value
  li r4, 0xC
  stb r4, 3(r3)
  # second value
  li r4, 0xE
  stb r4, 0xB(r3)
  # Third value
  li r4, 0xD
  stb r4, 0x13(r3)
  # Disable the menu options, show Melee+
  lis r4, 0x803F
  ori r4, r4, 0xA4E0  # 803FA4E0, The Main Debug Menu entry table start address
  li r3, 0
  stw r3, 0x60(r4)    # Set 4th item (Melee+ Toggles), to 0, or disabled
  stw r3, 0x80(r4)    # Set 5th item (Other toggles), to 0, or disabled
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA3E8  # 803FA3E8  "~Melee+ Enabled" string  (TODO: Change when made standalone)
  stw r3, 0x68(r4)    # Set the label of 4th item to this string

  RETURN:
  # Run all of the save functions
  lis r30, <<tblDbgMeleePlusTogglesSubMenu>>@h
  ori r30, r30, <<tblDbgMeleePlusTogglesSubMenu>>@l
  li r31, 0	# Loop var
  TRAVERSE_MENU_TABLE:
  mr r29, r30
  ANALYZE_MENU_ITEM:
  lwz r3, 0(r29)
  cmpwi r3, 0x9
  beq NEXT_TABLE
  lwz r3, 4(r29)
  cmpwi r3, 0
  beq NEXT_ITEM
  mtctr r3
  bctrl
  NEXT_ITEM:
  addi r29, r29, 0x20
  b ANALYZE_MENU_ITEM
  NEXT_TABLE:
  lis r30, <<tblDbgOtherTogglesSubMenu>>@h
  ori r30, r30, <<tblDbgOtherTogglesSubMenu>>@l
  addi r31, r31, 1
  cmpwi r31, 2            # We have two submenu tables to get through (set manually)
  blt TRAVERSE_MENU_TABLE
  # End loop
  li r3,0
  lwz r29, 0(sp)
  lwz r30, 4(sp)
  lwz r31, 8(sp)
  lwz r0,0x18(sp)
  addi sp,sp,0x14
  mtlr r0
  blr

NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x3F74E0 -----
00000000 00000000 803EA6C8 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00000001 803001DC 803FA454 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00000001 80301420 803FA468 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
00000002 80300218 803FA474 804D5888 803FA258 00000000 40000000 00000000
00000002 80300248 803FA480 804D5880 803FA25C 00000000 40000000 00000000
00000002 00000000 803FA48C 803FA440 804D4A08 00000000 40A00000 00000000
00000003 00000000 803FA498 00000000 804D4AF8 00000000 3F800000 3F800000
00000003 00000000 803FA4A8 00000000 804D6B88 00000000 3F800000 3F800000
 -> 
# Entry 0: Title
    00000000                                        # Disabled Type
    00000000                                        # n/a
    .long <<strSdRemixOptions>>                     # Label: "< SD REMIX OPTIONS >"
    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000    # n/a
# Entry 1: Submenu "General Options >"
    00000001                                        # Press-able
    .long <<funDebugSubmenu>>                       # Call submenu
    .long <<strGeneralOptionsSub>>                  # Label: "General Options >"
    00000000 00000000                               # n/a
    .long <<tblDbgGeneralOptsSubMenu>>              # General Options Submenu Data
    00000000 00000000                               # n/a
# Entry 2: String table, "TOGGLES: " [DISABLED, ENABLED, MELEE+ ENABLED ONLY]
    00000002                                        # String Table
    .long <<funDbgChangeTogglesState>>              # When new string chosen, this extra code is run
    .long <<strTogglesLabel>>                       # Label: "Toggles:"
    .long <<arrEnableDisabledMelee>>                # [Disabled, Enabled, Melee+ Only]
    .long <<varTogglesState>>                       # Variable
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40400000                                        # Num Items in table: 3.f
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 3: Submenu "Melee+ Toggles >"
    00000001                                        # Press-able
    .long <<funDebugSubmenu>>                       # Call submenu
    .long <<strMeleePlusTogglesSub>>                # Label: "Melee+ Toggles >"
    00000000 00000000                               # n/a
    .long <<tblDbgMeleePlusTogglesSubMenu>>         # Melee+ Toggles Submenu Data
    00000000 00000000                               # n/a
# Entry 4: Submenu "Other Toggles >"
    00000001                                        # Press-able
    .long <<funDebugSubmenu>>                       # Call submenu
    .long <<strOtherTogglesSub>>                    # Label: "Other Toggles >"
    00000000 00000000                               # n/a
    .long <<tblDbgOtherTogglesSubMenu>>             # Other Toggles Submenu Data
    00000000 00000000                               # n/a
# Entry 5: Menu "Credits >"
    00000001                                        # Press-able
    803002FC                                        # Function to go to "Mode Team Test" full menu
    .long <<strCreditsSub>>                         # Label: "Credits >"
    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000    # n/a
# Entry 6: Menu "Debug Menu >"
    00000001                                        # Press-able
    803001DC                                        # Function to go to "Versus Mode" full menu
    .long <<strDebugMenuSub>>                       # Label: "Debug Menu >"
    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000    # n/a
# END OF LIST (NOTE, there are actually 3 more entries in Melee's debug menu. Space for 3 more entries at least.
    00000009 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000


	-==-


Debug Menu: General Options Submenu
The functions, strings, and data for the submenu "General Options".
TODO: All of these toggles rely on overwriting code on the fly. Not only does this require workarounds on Dolphin due to code caching, but MCM doesn't really support this with branching. We will want to convert the raw branched codes into "Converted Mods", which consist of a standalone variable which tells the mod to turn on or off and each branch to then enable itself based on that variable. Then, any debug menu or whatever should just change that variable value.
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -

<strGeneralOptionsTitle> ALL            # "< General Options >"
3C 20 47 65 6E 65 72 61 6C 20 4F 70 74 69 6F 6E 73 20 3E 00

<strWidescreenOpt> ALL                  # "Widescreen:"
57696465 73637265 656E3A00

<strHoldStartExitResultsOpt> ALL        # "Hold start exit results: "
486F6C64 20737461 72742065 78697420 72657375 6C74733A 20000000

<strStockPlatformColorOpt> ALL          # "Stock platform colors: "
53746F63 6B20706C 6174666F 726D2063 6F6C6F72 733A2000

<varWidescreenEnabled> ALL
0000 0000

NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x18DCC0 -----
7C0802A6 3C808048 90010004
388499B8 9421FFE0 93E1001C 3BE4000C A004000C 80630028 28000320
4081000C 38000000 B01F0000 A09F0000 3C004330 C822AD38 90810014
->
39C00001 38600006 4BE909D8  # Widescreen 1
C03F0034 2C0E0001 41820024 3C004080 90010030 3C004040 90010034   # Widescreen 2
C0010030 EC210032 C0010034 EC210024 39C00000 281E0000 481D938C

<funDbgWidescreenOption> NTSC 1.02
  lis r3, <<varWidescreenEnabled>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<varWidescreenEnabled>>@l
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- TURN_ON
TURN_OFF:
  lis r4, 0x8002
  ori r4, r4, 0x1ABC        # 80021ABC     0x1E69C     38600006 Original
  lis r3, 0x3860
  ori r3, r3, 0x6
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8036
  ori r4, r4, 0xA4A8        # 8036A4A8     0x367088    C03F0034 Original
  lis r3, 0xC03F
  ori r3, r3, 0x34
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b RETURN
TURN_ON:
  lis r4, 0x8002
  ori r4, r4, 0x1ABC        # 80021ABC     0x1E69C     4816F624 Branch To?   b 0x16f624 (801910E0)
  lis r3, 0x4816
  ori r3, r3, 0xF624
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8036
  ori r4, r4, 0xA4A8        # 8036A4A8     0x367088    4BE26C44 Branch to?   b -0x1d93bc (801910EC)
  lis r3, 0x4BE2
  ori r3, r3, 0x6C44
  stw r3, 0(r4)
RETURN:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

<funDbgToggleHoldStartResultsScreen> NTSC 1.02
loc_0x0:
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA3AC        # TODO 803FA3AC
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- ENABLE
DISABLE:
  lis r4, 0x8017
  ori r4, r4, 0x8054        # TODO 80178054     Default 3C808047
  lis r3, 0x3C80
  ori r3, r3, 0x8047
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8017            # TODO 80178224     Default 80030008
  ori r4, r4, 0x8224
  lis r3, 0x8003
  ori r3, r3, 0x8
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801A            # TODO 801A4164     Default 41643800
  ori r4, r4, 0x4164
  lis r3, 0x3800
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b RETURN
ENABLE:
  lis r4, 0x8017
  ori r4, r4, 0x8054        # TODO 80178054     Enable branch
  lis r3, 0x4801
  ori r3, r3, 0x91B0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8017
  ori r4, r4, 0x8224        # TODO 80178224     Enable branch
  lis r3, 0x4801
  ori r3, r3, 0x9028
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801A
  ori r4, r4, 0x4164        # TODO 801A4164     Enable branch
  lis r3, 0x4BFE
  ori r3, r3, 0xD11C
  stw r3, 0(r4)
RETURN:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

<funDbgToggleStockPlatformColor> NTSC 1.02
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA3A4        # TODO 803FA3A4
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- ENABLE
DISABLE:
  lis r4, 0x800D
  ori r4, r4, 0x5008        # TODO 800D5008     Default 7C7E1B78
  lis r3, 0x7C7E
  ori r3, r3, 0x1B78
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b RETURN
ENABLE:
  lis r4, 0x800D
  ori r4, r4, 0x5008        # TODO 800D5008     Branch
  lis r3, 0x480B
  ori r3, r3, 0xC11C
  stw r3, 0(r4)
RETURN:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

<tblDbgGeneralOptsSubMenu> NTSC 1.02
# Entry 0: Menu Title
    00000000                                        # Disabled
    00000000                                        # n/a
    .long <<strGeneralOptionsTitle>>                # Label/Title
    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000    # n/a
# Entry 1: Widescreen Option
    00000002                                        # String Table
    .long <<funDbgWidescreenOption>>                # Called when value changes
    .long <<strWidescreenOpt>>                      # Label
    .long <<arrEnableDisabledMelee>>                # [Disabled, Enabled]
    .long <<varWidescreenEnabled>>                  # Variable
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 2: Hold start to exit results screen
    00000002                                        # String Table
    .long <<funDbgToggleHoldStartResultsScreen>>    # Toggle function
    .long <<strHoldStartExitResultsOpt>>            # Label
    .long <<arrEnableDisabledMelee>>                # [Disabled, Enabled]
    803FA3AC                                        # TODO
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 3: Stock Platform Colors
    00000002                                        # String Table
    .long <<funDbgToggleStockPlatformColor>>        # Toggle function
    .long <<strStockPlatformColorOpt>>              # Label
    .long <<arrEnableDisabledMelee>>                # [Disabled, Enabled]
    803FA3A4                                        # TODO
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# END OF LIST
    00000009 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000


	-==-


Overtime and Bomb Rain
The functions, strings, and data for bomb rain, pokeball rain, and tournament overtime.
These three items are very tightly knit, so they go together here. Places that toggle these various things should call on the standalone items created here.
TODO: All of these toggles rely on overwriting code on the fly. Not only does this require workarounds on Dolphin due to code caching, but MCM doesn't really support this with branching. We will want to convert the raw branched codes into "Converted Mods", which consist of a standalone variable which tells the mod to turn on or off and each branch to then enable itself based on that variable. Then, any debug menu or whatever should just change that variable value.
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
<funDbgToggleOvertimeAndBombRain> NTSC 1.02
# r10 is set to master toggle
  lis r10, <<varTogglesState>>@h
  ori r10, r10, <<varTogglesState>>@l
  lwz r10, 0(r10)

# Apply Overtime if it is enabled
  cmpwi r10, 0x1
  blt- NORMAL_OVERTIME
  bgt- TOURNAMENT_OVERTIME
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA36C        # TODO 803FA36C
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- TOURNAMENT_OVERTIME

# Apply Normal Overtime code
NORMAL_OVERTIME:
  lis r4, 0x801A
  ori r4, r4, 0x415C    # TODO 801A415C     Default 3803FFFF
  lis r3, 0x3803
  ori r3, r3, 0xFFFF
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 8016DD38     Default 881E0000
  ori r4, r4, 0xDD38
  lis r3, 0x881E
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 8016DDCC     Default 901F0028
  ori r4, r4, 0xDDCC
  lis r3, 0x901F
  ori r3, r3, 0x28
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8006        # TODO 80067E78     Default D01B1830
  ori r4, r4, 0x7E78
  lis r3, 0xD01B
  ori r3, r3, 0x1830
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8003        # TODO 800343B4     Default 7FDD032E
  ori r4, r4, 0x43B4
  lis r3, 0x7FDD
  ori r3, r3, 0x32E
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 80165DC4     Default 38040001
  ori r4, r4, 0x5DC4
  lis r3, 0x3804
  ori r3, r3, 0x1
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 80165E0C     Default 38040001
  ori r4, r4, 0x5E0C
  lis r3, 0x3804
  ori r3, r3, 0x1
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 80165E54     Default 38040001
  ori r4, r4, 0x5E54
  lis r3, 0x3804
  ori r3, r3, 0x1
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  li r9, 0x0
  b BREAK_OVERTIME

# Apply tournament overtime code
TOURNAMENT_OVERTIME:
  lis r4, 0x801A
  ori r4, r4, 0x415C    # TODO 801A415C     Branch
  lis r3, 0x4BFE
  ori r3, r3, 0xD328
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 8016DD38     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0xDD38
  lis r3, 0x4802
  ori r3, r3, 0x3988
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 8016DDCC     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0xDDCC
  lis r3, 0x4802
  ori r3, r3, 0x3934
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8006        # TODO 80067E78     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0x7E78
  lis r3, 0x4812
  ori r3, r3, 0x98A8
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8003
  ori r4, r4, 0x43B4    # TODO 800343B4     Branch
  lis r3, 0x4815
  ori r3, r3, 0xD394
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 80165DC4     38040000
  ori r4, r4, 0x5DC4
  lis r3, 0x3804
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 80165E0C     38040000
  ori r4, r4, 0x5E0C
  lis r3, 0x3804
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8016        # TODO 80165E54     38040000
  ori r4, r4, 0x5E54
  lis r3, 0x3804
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  li r9, 0x1

BREAK_OVERTIME:
  # Now toggle the bombs
  cmpwi r10, 0x1
  blt- BOMB_NORMAL
  bgt- BOMB_OVERTIME
  # Check the Bomb toggle
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA390    # TODO 803FA390
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x1
  beq- BOMB_ALWAYS
  bgt- BOMB_POKEBALLS
  # Check if we applied tournament overtime
  cmpwi r9, 0x0
  bne- BOMB_OVERTIME

BOMB_NORMAL:
  lis r4, 0x8026
  ori r4, r4, 0xBEC0    # TODO 8026BEC0     Default 801E0014
  lis r3, 0x801E
  ori r3, r3, 0x14
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8029        # TODO 80294DCC     Default 3800001F
  ori r4, r4, 0x4DCC
  lis r3, 0x3800
  ori r3, r3, 0x1F
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EB4     Default 40810094
  ori r4, r4, 0xEB4
  lis r3, 0x4081
  ori r3, r3, 0x94
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EA8     Default 418200A0
  ori r4, r4, 0xEA8
  lis r3, 0x4182
  ori r3, r3, 0xA0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b RETURN

BOMB_OVERTIME:
  lis r4, 0x8026
  ori r4, r4, 0xBEC0    # TODO 8026BEC0     801E0014
  lis r3, 0x801E
  ori r3, r3, 0x14
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8029        # TODO 80294DCC     3800001F
  ori r4, r4, 0x4DCC
  lis r3, 0x3800
  ori r3, r3, 0x1F
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EB4     48000094
  ori r4, r4, 0xEB4
  lis r3, 0x4800
  ori r3, r3, 0x94
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EA8     418200A0
  ori r4, r4, 0xEA8
  lis r3, 0x4182
  ori r3, r3, 0xA0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b RETURN

BOMB_ALWAYS:
  lis r4, 0x8026
  ori r4, r4, 0xBEC0    # TODO 8026BEC0     801E0014
  lis r3, 0x801E
  ori r3, r3, 0x14
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8029        # TODO 80294DCC     3800001F
  ori r4, r4, 0x4DCC
  lis r3, 0x3800
  ori r3, r3, 0x1F
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EB4     60000000
  ori r4, r4, 0xEB4
  lis r3, 0x6000
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EA8     60000000
  ori r4, r4, 0xEA8
  lis r3, 0x6000
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b RETURN

BOMB_POKEBALLS:
  lis r4, 0x8026
  ori r4, r4, 0xBEC0    # TODO 8026BEC0     3800001F
  lis r3, 0x3800
  ori r3, r3, 0x1F
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8029        # TODO 80294DCC     38000022
  ori r4, r4, 0x4DCC
  lis r3, 0x3800
  ori r3, r3, 0x22
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EB4     60000000
  ori r4, r4, 0xEB4
  lis r3, 0x6000
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801C        # TODO 801C0EA8     60000000
  ori r4, r4, 0xEA8
  lis r3, 0x6000
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)

RETURN:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr


	-==-


Debug Menu: Melee+ Options Submenu
The functions, strings, and data for the submenu "Melee+ Options".
TODO: All of these toggles rely on overwriting code on the fly. Not only does this require workarounds on Dolphin due to code caching, but MCM doesn't really support this with branching. We will want to convert the raw branched codes into "Converted Mods", which consist of a standalone variable which tells the mod to turn on or off and each branch to then enable itself based on that variable. Then, any debug menu or whatever should just change that variable value.
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -

<funDbgToggleHandicapStock> NTSC 1.02
loc_0x0:
  lis r3, <<varTogglesState>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<varTogglesState>>@l
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x1
  blt- DISABLED
  bgt- ENABLE
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA368    # TODO 803FA368
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- ENABLE
DISABLED:
  lis r4, 0x8003
  ori r4, r4, 0x6BB4    # TODO 80036BB4     Default 9803008E
  lis r3, 0x9803
  ori r3, r3, 0x8E
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8026        # TODO 80266678     Default 3803FFFF
  ori r4, r4, 0x6678
  lis r3, 0x3803
  ori r3, r3, 0xFFFF
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801A        # TODO 801A57DC     Default 38BEFFF8
  ori r4, r4, 0x57DC
  lis r3, 0x38BE
  ori r3, r3, 0xFFF8
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8023        # TODO 80230D54     Default 88030005
  ori r4, r4, 0xD54
  lis r3, 0x8803
  ori r3, r3, 0x5
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8022        # TODO 8022F76C     Default 881C0004
  ori r4, r4, 0xF76C
  lis r3, 0x881C
  ori r3, r3, 0x4
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8022        # TODO 8022F6BC     Default 881C0004
  ori r4, r4, 0xF6BC
  lis r3, 0x881C
  ori r3, r3, 0x4
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8003        # TODO 80033CC4     Default 98A3008E
  ori r4, r4, 0x3CC4
  lis r3, 0x98A3
  ori r3, r3, 0x8E
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b loc_0x148
ENABLE:
  lis r4, 0x8003        # TODO 80036BB4     Noop 60000000
  ori r4, r4, 0x6BB4
  lis r3, 0x6000
  ori r3, r3, 0x0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8026        # TODO 80266678     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0x6678
  lis r3, 0x4BF2
  ori r3, r3, 0xAC4C
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x801A        # TODO 801A57DC     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0x57DC
  lis r3, 0x4BFE
  ori r3, r3, 0xBB8C
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8023        # TODO 80230D54     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0xD54
  lis r3, 0x4BF6
  ori r3, r3, 0x638
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8022        # TODO 8022F76C     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0xF76C
  lis r3, 0x4BF6
  ori r3, r3, 0x1C50
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8022        # TODO 8022F6BC     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0xF6BC
  lis r3, 0x4BF6
  ori r3, r3, 0x1D3C
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8003        # TODO 80033CC4     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0x3CC4
  lis r3, 0x4815
  ori r3, r3, 0xD770
  stw r3, 0(r4)
loc_0x148:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

<funDbgToggleLedgeInvincibility> NTSC 1.02
  lis r3, <<varTogglesState>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<varTogglesState>>@l
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x1
  blt- loc_0x2C
  bgt- loc_0x58
  lis r3, 0x803F        # TODO 803FA370
  ori r3, r3, 0xA370
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- loc_0x58
loc_0x2C:
  lis r4, 0x8009
  ori r4, r4, 0xA8AC    # TODO 8009A8AC     Default 8084049C
  lis r3, 0x8084
  ori r3, r3, 0x49C
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8006
  ori r4, r4, 0xA414    # TODO 8006A414     Default 807F1990
  lis r3, 0x807F
  ori r3, r3, 0x1990
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b loc_0x80
loc_0x58:
  lis r4, 0x8009
  ori r4, r4, 0xA8AC    # TODO 8009A8AC     480F6EBC
  lis r3, 0x480F
  ori r3, r3, 0x6EBC
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  lis r4, 0x8006        # TODO 8006A414     481273A0
  ori r4, r4, 0xA414
  lis r3, 0x4812
  ori r3, r3, 0x73A0
  stw r3, 0(r4)
loc_0x80:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

<funDbgToggleWallBracing> NTSC 1.02
  lis r3, <<varTogglesState>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<varTogglesState>>@l
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x1
  blt- loc_0x2C
  bgt- loc_0x44
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA3D0    # TODO 803FA3D0
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- loc_0x44
loc_0x2C:
  lis r4, 0x8008
  ori r4, r4, 0xDFAC    # TODO 8008DFAC     Default 2C1C0003
  lis r3, 0x2C1C
  ori r3, r3, 0x3
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b loc_0x58
loc_0x44:
  lis r4, 0x8008        # TODO 8008DFAC     Branch
  ori r4, r4, 0xDFAC
  lis r3, 0x4810
  ori r3, r3, 0x3838
  stw r3, 0(r4)
loc_0x58:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

<funDbgToggleCappedPoints> NTSC 1.02
  lis r3, <<varTogglesState>>@h
  ori r3, r3, <<varTogglesState>>@l
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x1
  blt- loc_0x2C
  bgt- loc_0x44
  lis r3, 0x803F
  ori r3, r3, 0xA378    # TODO 803FA378
  lwz r3, 0(r3)
  cmpwi r3, 0x0
  bne- loc_0x44
loc_0x2C:
  lis r4, 0x8016
  ori r4, r4, 0xCDAC    # TODO 8016CDAC     Default 88030005
  lis r3, 0x8803
  ori r3, r3, 0x5
  stw r3, 0(r4)
  b loc_0x58
loc_0x44:
  lis r4, 0x8016
  ori r4, r4, 0xCDAC    # TODO 8016CDAC     Branch
  lis r3, 0x4802
  ori r3, r3, 0x4A70
  stw r3, 0(r4)
loc_0x58:
  li r3, 0x0
  blr

    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000    # n/a

    .long <<funDbgToggleHandicapStock>>             # Toggle function

    803FCB10                                        # TODO

    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 2: Tournament Overtime or normal overtime
    00000002                                        # String Table

    803FCBB8                                        # Label: TODO
    803FCB18                                        # TODO
    803FA36C                                        # TODO
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 3: Ledge invincibility attrition
    00000002                                        # String Table

    803FCBC4                                        # Label: TODO
    803FCB20                                        # TODO
    803FA370                                        # TODO
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 4: Wall bracing
    00000002                                        # String Table
    .long <<funDbgToggleWallBracing>>               # Toggle function
    803FCBDC                                        # Label: TODO
    .long <<arrEnableDisabledMelee>>                # [Disabled, Enabled]
    803FA3D0                                        # TODO
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# Entry 5: Capped Points/Tennis mode
    00000002                                        # String Table
    .long <<funDbgToggleCappedPoints>>              # Toggle function
    803FCBEC                                        # Label: TODO
    .long <<arrEnableDisabledMelee>>                # [Disabled, Enabled]
    803FA378                                        # TODO
    00000000                                        # n/a
    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a
# END OF LIST

Debug Menu: Other Options Submenu
The functions, strings, and data for the submenu "Other Options".
TODO: All of these toggles rely on overwriting code on the fly. Not only does this require workarounds on Dolphin due to code caching, but MCM doesn't really support this with branching. We will want to convert the raw branched codes into "Converted Mods", which consist of a standalone variable which tells the mod to turn on or off and each branch to then enable itself based on that variable. Then, any debug menu or whatever should just change that variable value.
[_glook]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
<tblDbgOtherTogglesSubMenu> NTSC 1.02

    00000000 00000000                               # Disabled
    803FC420                                        # Label TODO
    00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000    # n/a

    803FC42C                                        # Label: TODO
    803FC4C0                                        # TODO
    803FA388                                        # TODO

    40000000                                        # 2 item table
    00000000                                        # n/a

    803FC438                                        # Label: TODO

Debug Menu Strings/Entries (TODO: GET RID OF ME)
Replaces various strings in debug menu.
[_glook]
